::Spears::

She dodges one shot, but the other hits it's mark.  She falls 
backward, dropping her staff.  She slow gets up on her knees and 
tries to reach for her staff.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Serpentor:
> 
> 
> Serpentor curses.  Raising his rifle he fired off two plasma bolts 
at Spears' 
> sternum.  Slowly taking steps backwards, getting ready to run if 
she fell.  
> This was hurting to much.  And when Ramboy joined in, it would hurt 
a lot 
> worse.
